Go check it out!

It's a good one!
Click to know about the App

Hi, I am João Paulo, student of Computer Engineering\nThis is UNES - UNES Não É Sagres, an app to help your student life :)\n The source code of this app is available at github.com/ForceTower/UEFS_Sagres_App

This app is not endorsed nor licensed by TecnoTrends and has no connection with the enterprise that offers the Sagres to the university. The app not intended for profit-making and was developed to help the day life of the students

The information gathered by the app are only accessible by you. Your username and password are saved exclusively on YOUR SMARTPHONE(Or at your Google\'s account, in case your smartphone supports backup).

After the first login you will have access to you schedule, grades and messages. These data are stored on your smartphone, so even when you have no connection you\'ll still be able to read the data and when your connection returns it will update the data again. The app updates your information periodically and you can control the frequency this happens
You will receive a notification whenever someone posts a new Grade or a Message on the website (with some delay, based on the selected frequency)

At any moment you can logout by clicking at Settings>Logoff, this action will erase all the saved data related to your Sagres account from the device. You can login again at any time and return receiving notifications.
For some stupid mistake, if your Android version is 8.0+ (Oreo) you\'ll not receive any notifications, I\'m working on fixing it :^)
Connecting, you don\'t need to relog
You\'ll not be notified when a new grade arrive
You\'ll be notified when a new grade arrive
